text.section: Each credit union shall have at least five directors.
A director holds office for the term that the bylaws provide, which may not exceed 3 years, and until a successor is elected and qualifies.

Each director shall take an oath that the director:
Will diligently and honestly perform the duties as director in administering the credit union's affairs;
Will remain responsible for the performance of the duties of the director even if the director delegates the performance of the duties; and
Will not knowingly or willfully permit the violation of an applicable law or regulation.
The chairman and, if any, vice chairman of the board shall be elected by and from the directors.
